sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnnotetrnsmit ( NOTE_ID /* */ , NOTE_TRNSMIT_ID /* */ , TRNSMITER_ID /* */ , DELETE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #noteId# /* */ , #noteTrnsmitId# /* */ , #trnsmiterId# /* */ , #deleteAt# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnnotetrnsmit SET NOTE_ID=#noteId# /* */ , NOTE_TRNSMIT_ID=#noteTrnsmitId# /* */ , TRNSMITER_ID=#trnsmiterId# /* */ , DELETE_AT=#deleteAt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE NOTE_ID=#noteId# /* */ AND NOTE_TRNSMIT_ID=#noteTrnsmitId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnnotetrnsmit WHERE NOTE_ID=#noteId# /* */ AND NOTE_TRNSMIT_ID=#noteTrnsmitId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT NOTE_ID /* */ , NOTE_TRNSMIT_ID /* */ , TRNSMITER_ID /* */ , DELETE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnnotetrnsmit WHERE NOTE_ID=#noteId# /* */ AND NOTE_TRNSMIT_ID=#noteTrnsmitId# /* */

SELECT NOTE_ID /* */ , NOTE_TRNSMIT_ID /* */ , TRNSMITER_ID /* */ , DELETE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnnotetrnsmit WHERE 1=1
NOTE_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
NOTE_TRNSMIT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY NOTE_ID DESC /* */ , NOTE_TRNSMIT_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

NOTE_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
